channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MT

item.title: Report X-2024071589
item.description:

  • Description: X-2024071589 The package was found wet on the unload side. Inspection found one bottle of Flatware Presoak had a loose cap allowing contents to leak out.
